alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LINE OF SHOWERS WILL IMPACT CRAWFORD COUNTY THROUGH 1015 PM EST... At 844 PM EST, the public and emergency management reported showers along a line extending from 18 miles north of Geneva-On-The-Lake to 6 miles north of Orwell to Vienna Center. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Public and Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Cambridge Springs, Linesville, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North, Atlantic, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneautville, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Hydetown, and Springboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
